channel.title: Changing the
channel.description:
Changing the... headicons for prayer, were can i do it i looked in my client folder for head icons. and i changed it to a pic that i wanted but still looked same with sword for protect melee.....
i looked in the whole sprites folder and they're went any pics with protect melee... and still picture is coming when i compile and run i use protect from melee the sword still comes!! how can i change!
is it to do with chache!?
and wat do i use to open class files? to work on the cache and other files?
